description: This file defines a React component named NotePanel, which manages viewing, creating, editing, and deleting notes. It interacts with an API to fetch and modify note data, and provides a UI for users to manage notes within a note-organizer application.

methods.name: NotePanel
methods.description: React component handling note display, editing, creation, and deletion with internal state management and effect handling.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Handles saving a new or existing note, updating UI state accordingly.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Handles deleting the current note, updating parent state and UI.
